servinfo.title: Fuel Tank Inlet Valve Removal and Installation

attention1.ptxt: When performing the following procedure, be sure to observe Precautions on Fuel System Service:N32A in order to reduce the risk or fire and personal injury.

s1.ptxt: Insert hose of a hand operated pump into fuel filler hose (1) and drain fuel in space “A” shown in figure.

attention2.ptxt: Do not force pump hose into fuel tank, or pump hose may damage fuel tank inlet valve (2).

s1.ptxt: Hoist vehicle, and remove clamps (2) and fuel filler hose (1).
Remove fuel tank inlet valves (1) using flat blade screw driver (2) or the like.

attention2.ptxt: Be careful not to damage fuel tank inlet valve (1) with flat blade screw driver (2) or the like.

s1.ptxt: Install fuel tank inlet valves (1) to fuel tank.

Install fuel filler hose (1) to fuel filler neck as shown in figure, and tighten fuel filler hose clamp to specified torque. For proper installation, refer to Fuel Hose Disconnecting and Reconnecting:N32A .
Lower vehicle and install fuel filler cap.
